# Shaken
## Overview
A shaken character takes a â€“2 penalty on attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks, and ability checks. Shaken is a less severe state of fear than [[Frightened|frightened]] or [[Panicked|panicked]].

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 568
